text:
The URL structure:
<host_name>:<port>/servlet/MyServlet?status=<base64_encoded_status>

If <base64_encoded_status> contains "=" the getParameterNames() method called 
on the request object fails.
creator: ennio.lepri@fao.org
remm@apache.org
text: In URLs, '=' is a special reserved character which must be encoded (using %xx).
